attributes.action: Pull the UK out of the eurovision
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having watched the debacle again it is obvious that we are not liked by the rest of Europe even though we are the first port of call when people or countries are in trouble / need. 
The Eurovision is the most corrupt competition ever invented & unless you are a Balkan country you have no chance of ever winning.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
